tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Monday Brief: IFA 2012, BB10 Hardware, a WP8 Lumia Leak, and more!
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
Welcome to the Mobile Nations Monday Brief, which rounds up all of the news of the week prior on the Smartphone Experts Network of Community Sites, including Android Central, CrackBerry, iMore, WPCentral, and WebOSNation.
You can subscribe to us at youtube.com/mobilenations, and watch the video recap every Monday on your favorite sites above!
Twitter: http://twitter.com/mobilenations Ashley: http://twitter.com/ashleyesqueda

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Ya just can't﻿ beat mobile news by the fabulous Ashley!
Don't talk about they have patented talks about﻿ them
How's it feel to know that the only reason﻿ any male watches your videos are to stare at your tits? What an accomplishment. You must be very proud.
I feel good being called a﻿ mobile "delegate"

Apples real plans to sue EVERYONE that they are losing my too because they can't except the fact that they are losing money every single day too companies like Google and Samsung. Apple is a very greedy company who needs taught a huge lesson. They are a pathetic company because what they are accusing Samsung of doing they do more then all the others put together. They are losing market share to Android daily and they are crying over this﻿ fact. They are not getting one red cent from me.
